InstructionData.Instructions:
#Ore define IronOre 1758427767 define CopperOre -707307845 define GoldOre -1348105509 define Coal 1724793494 define SiliconOre 1103972403 define CobaltOre -983091249 define LeadOre -190236170 define NickelOre 1830218956 define SilverOre -916518678 define UraniumOre -1516581844
alias Valve2R0 d0 alias Splitter2R0 d1 alias Valve2R1 d2 alias Splitter2R1 d3 alias Valve2R2 d4 alias Splitter2R2 d5 alias HashValue r0 alias VKE r1 alias SorterOutput r5
#Init s Valve2R0 On 1 #switches eveything on. s Valve2R0 Setting 1 #closes after one element s Splitter2R0 On 1 s Splitter2R0 Mode 0 #default direction s Splitter2R0 Setting 0 #deactivate splitting s Splitter2R0 SettingOutput 0 #deactivate splitting s Valve2R1 On 1 s Valve2R1 Setting 1 s Splitter2R1 On 1 s Splitter2R1 Mode 0 s Splitter2R1 Setting 0 s Splitter2R1 SettingOutput 0 s Valve2R2 On 1 s Valve2R2 Setting 1 s Splitter2R2 On 1 s Splitter2R2 Mode 0 s Splitter2R2 Setting 0 s Splitter2R2 SettingOutput 0
Main: ls HashValue Valve2R0 0 OccupantHash #Splitter sort seq VKE HashValue NickelOre s Splitter2R0 Mode VKE sne VKE HashValue 0 s Valve2R0 Open VKE #################### Sorter 1L ########## ls HashValue Valve2R1 0 OccupantHash #Splitter sort seq VKE HashValue LeadOre s Splitter2R1 Mode VKE sne VKE HashValue 0 s Valve2R1 Open VKE #################### Sorter 1R ########## ls HashValue Valve2R2 0 OccupantHash #Splitter sort seq VKE HashValue UraniumOre s Splitter2R2 Mode VKE sne VKE HashValue 0 s Valve2R2 Open VKE ############################### sleep 0.1 #sleep for the last sorter
#Backlock safety Loop0: ls HashValue Splitter2R0 0 OccupantHash bne HashValue 0 Loop0
Loop1L: ls HashValue Splitter2R1 0 OccupantHash bne HashValue 0 Loop1L
Loop1R: ls HashValue Splitter2R2 0 OccupantHash bne HashValue 0 Loop1R j Main
